ul.li: Test Campaign Groups allow users to create and add their test campaigns to one or more groups.
It will then calculate the test case execution data for each test campaign and give an overall value.

section.title: Adding a Group
section.p: To add a group the user can click on the "Add Group" button and enter the name of the group to be added.
section.title: Adding a Test Campaign to a Group
section.p: In the test campaign edit screen a new component called group will allow users to associate the test campaign with a group. This is an optional field.

ul.li:
If users enter search criteria the url will be updated with the search criteria.
If the user specifies the exact name of the folder it will auto select the group to display to the user. e.g. /#tm/testCampaignGroups?name~test

section.title: Edit a Test Campaign Group
section.ul:
Users may edit the name of a test campaign group by following these steps:
Select the test campaign group you wish to edit
Click on the edit icon
Enter the new name and click 'Edit'

section.title: Delete a Test Campaign Group
section.ul:
Users may delete a test campaign group by following these steps:
Select the test campaign group you wish to edit
Click on the delete icon
Confirm that you wish to proceed with the delete

section.title: Copy Url for a Test Campaign Group
section.ul:
Users may copy the url for a test campaign group by following these steps:
Select the test campaign group you wish to copy url for
Click on the copy link icon
